title: [Bliss Island, Beach]
description: Lapping waters caress the peaceful beach, the surf creating a gentle rhythm like the heartbeat of the secluded island.  Scattered about are variegated seashells that have washed up onto shore over time.  Bathed in moonlight, a lone palm has been sent swaying in the tropical night, casting a dancing shadow against the pale sand.
